spec.question_description: Which region would you like your Matrix server to be in? Think carefully as this decision can only be made once.
spec.choices:
New York City (USA)
San Francisco (USA)
Amsterdam (NLD)
Frankfurt (DEU)
Singapore (SGP)

spec.question_description: The base domain of your website (Eg: example.org), this must be a domain name you own and can't be a subdomain. Think carefully as this decision can only be made once.
Do web services already exist at this domain? If so select 'true' you'll need to configure a .well-known entry at this domain before deploying. Contact support if you need assistance doing this.
